```

     hostgroups  servers,web-servers

 hostgroup_members  web-servers

 hostgroups  web-servers

        hostgroup_name  web-servers
     members         web-server-.+

```

 host_name            web-server-.+

    check_command        check_http
}

# cd /usr/local/nagios/etc
# chown nagios.nagios resource.cfg
# chmod 0600 resource.cfg

```

```
define host {
    use                 critical-host
    host_name           sparta.naginet
    alias               sparta
    address             10.128.0.21
 _mac_address        08:00:27:7e:7c:d2
}
```

```
define service {
    use                  generic-service
    host_name            sparta.naginet
    service_description  ARP
    check_command        check_arp!$_HOSTMAC_ADDRESS$
}
```

```
    define(`NAGHOST', `
        define host {
            host_name              $1
            alias                  $2
            address                $3
            contact_groups         ifelse(`$#', `4', `$4', `admins')
            check_command          check-host-alive
            check_interval         5
            check_period           24x7
            max_check_attempts     3
            notification_interval  30
            notification_options   d,r
            notification_period    24x7
        }
        define service {
            host_name              $1
            contact_groups         ifelse(`$#', `4', `$4', `admins')
            check_command          check_ping!100,10%!200,20%
            check_interval         5
            check_period           24x7
            max_check_attempts     3
            notification_interval  30
            notification_period    24x7
            retry_interval         1
            service_description    PING
        }
    ')
    ```

```
    $ m4 sparta.host.m4
    define host {
     host_name              sparta
     alias                  Sparta Webserver
     address                10.0.128.21
     contact_groups         admins
     check_command          check-host-alive
     check_interval         5
     check_period           24x7
     max_check_attempts     3
     notification_interval  30
     notification_options   d,r
     notification_period    24x7
    }
    define service {
     host_name              sparta
     contact_groups         admins
     check_command          check_ping!100,10%!200,20%
     check_interval         5
     check_period           24x7
     max_check_attempts     3
     notification_interval  30
     notification_period    24x7
     retry_interval         1
     service_description    PING
    }
    $ m4 athens.host.m4
    define host {
     host_name              athens
     alias                  Athens Webserver
     address                10.0.128.22
     contact_groups         ops
     check_command          check-host-alive
     check_interval         5
     check_period           24x7
     max_check_attempts     3
     notification_interval  30
     notification_options   d,r
     notification_period    24x7
    }
    define service {
     host_name              athens
     contact_groups         ops
     check_command          check_ping!100,10%!200,20%
     check_interval         5
     check_period           24x7
     max_check_attempts     3
     notification_interval  30
     notification_period    24x7
     retry_interval         1
     service_description    PING
    }
